alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 9:39PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Montgomery, Bath, Menifee, southeastern Fleming and Rowan Counties through 1030 PM EST... At 938 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winchester, or 10 miles west of Mount Sterling, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wades Mill, Grassy Lick, Klondike and Sideview around 945 PM EST. Mount Sterling, Prewitt, Judy and Levee around 950 PM EST. Jeffersonville, Camargo, Ewington, Howards Mill, Gatewoods Station, Coons Station, Stoops, Upper Spencer, Flat Creek and Lower Spencer around 955 PM EST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
